entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
